songs.title: Private Show
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jesy Nelson]
You got my adrenaline, pumping when you stand so close, mmm
I can't help imagining all the things we'd do with no clothes on

[Pre-Chorus: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & All]
We're touching, we're teasing (Yeah, yeah), we don't need a reason (Yeah, yeah)
And I've got a feeling (Yeah, yeah), that soon we'll be leaving (Yeah, yeah)
Right from the get-go (Yeah, yeah), you had me at "hello" (Yeah, yeah)
Can't wait, so let's go (Yeah, yeah), 'cause you're the only one that's taking me home

[Chorus: All & Jesy Nelson]
Can't wait to get in my zone, who said we gotta go slow?
Turn down the lights and watch my private show
You've got a ticket, front row (Hey), to get high, we got to get low (Hey, hey)
'Cause this is your private show

[Verse 2: Jade Thirlwall]
Put your kisses on my lips, we ain't here for playing these games, ahh, no (Hey)
It's loving with a little twist, get you hooked with just one taste, hey, yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards & All]
We're touching, we're teasing (Yeah, yeah), we don't need a reason (Yeah, yeah)
And I've got a feeling (Yeah, yeah), that soon we'll be leaving (Yeah, yeah)
Right from the get-go (Yeah, yeah), you had me at "hello" (Yeah, yeah)
Can't wait, so let's go (Yeah, yeah), 'cause you're the only one that's taking me home

[Chorus: All & Jesy Nelson]
Can't wait to get in my zone, who said we gotta go slow?
Turn down the lights and watch my private show (Woo)
You've got a ticket, front row (Hey), to get high, we got to get low (Hey, hey)
'Cause this is your private show

[Bridge: Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall or Both & Perrie Edwards]
Under the sheets, let me love you so good
If you want to touch it then baby you should (Oh, yeah)
You got my permission to do what you like (Oh, yeah)
'Cause you're the only one that's taking me home (Home, yeah)

[Chorus: All, Jade Thirlwall, Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Jesy Nelson]
Can't wait to get in my zone (Nah, nah), who said we gotta go slow? (Go slow?)
Turn down the lights and watch my private show (Ohh) (Woo)
You've got a ticket, front row (Hey), to get high, we got to get low (High, we got to get low, yeah)
'Cause this is your private show (Show, oh)
